toasty.default.toast.title: Toasty is a nice mod!
toasty.default.toast.body: Toasty allows you to make toast like popups... Please don't put ads here!
toasty.screen.error.body_file_exists: Toasty will not overwrite it. Change your file name or delete it yourself.
toasty.screen.success.title: Successfully wrote Toast to disk!
toasty.screen.success.body: The toast file can be found in the /toasts directory.
toasty.screen.error.title: An error occured while saving the Toast
toasty.screen.error.body: Check the log for more details
